author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body:
Your `new package` pull request met all of the guidelines for auto-merging and is scheduled to be merged when the mandatory waiting period (3 days) has elapsed.

Since you are registering a new package, please make sure that you have read the package naming guidelines: https://julialang.github.io/Pkg.jl/dev/creating-packages/#Package-naming-guidelines-1



---
If you want to prevent this pull request from being auto-merged, simply leave a comment. If you want to post a comment without blocking auto-merging, you must include the text `[noblock]` in your comment.
<!-- [noblock] -->
<!---
this_is_the_single_automerge_comment
--->

@giordano, Sorry, because package registration takes three days, I wanted to register first and fill in the contents later.  Didn't know that this is impossible.

While filling in the contents, I decided to change the package name to `VoxelwiseConstantMapping`.  Initiating the registration of the renamed package created a new PR.  Therefore, I would like to close this PR, and also would like to discontinue the registration procedure of the old package described in this PR.

The 3-days waiting period is to let others review new packages.  Doing name-squatting with an empty package defies this purpose and is very much not appreciated.  I hope you understand.

I'm closing this PR per your request
